    • Constructor Detail

      • MetricLoaderHelper

        public MetricLoaderHelper(java.lang.ClassLoader cl,
                          java.lang.String baseName)
                   throws java.io.IOException

        Create a new loader helper.

        Parameters:
        cl - The class loader.
        baseName - The base name for files to look for; will load from META-INF/lenskit/baseName.properteis.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an error loading the properties.

    • Method Detail

public java.lang.Class<?> findClass(java.lang.String name)

        Look up the class implementing a metric by name.

        Parameters:
        name - The metric name.
        Returns:
        The metric class.

      • getMetricTypeName

        public java.lang.String getMetricTypeName(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode node)

        Get the metric type name from a node. If the node is a string, the string is returned; otherwise, the object’s type property is returned.

        Parameters:
        node - The node.
        Returns:
        The type name.
